name: Dark Voices (MarkOWin)
description:
Madman broke free and tries to escape from the tireless pursuer. But who is more insane, the one who sees the carnivorous buses, the floor of the lava and the tentacles of dark monsters or idle crowd wandering aimlessly along the roads of an endless city?

FEATURES:

* 4 types of Insane voices to change the run
* Different abilities
* Crazy obstacles
* Changeable controls
* Isometric camera
* Several playable characters
